document_data.name: ''Scarab of Life''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''scarab of life''''' was an [[enchanted]] piece of jewelry that could raise the dead.
document_data.Description: The ''scarab'' was a jeweled [[beetle]] set in an [[ankh]].
document_data.Powers: When worn by a [[priest]]'s brow, the ''scarab of life'' enable them to cast ''[[cure critical wounds]]'' once per day and ''[[raise dead]]'' once per week. Both powers required uttering a [[command word]]. With each use of this item's powers there was a one in ten chance that it would lose its [[magic]].
